Class UpdateCustomerController

java.lang.Object
Controller.UpdateCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The UpdateCustomerController class is the controller to update Customer information.

      Checks that there are no empty fields on the form

      Name - String variable for customer name
      Address - String variable for customer address
      PostalCode - String variable for customer postal coded
      PhoneNumber - String variable for customer phone number
      Returns:
      Boolean true if everything is entered correctly and false if otherwise
